content: this classic shawl is a perfect way to keep your shoulders warm in chilly rooms the pattern is easy to stitch and the ombré stripe effect knits up beautifully what you will need * red heart® super saver ombre ™ 1 skein * susan bates® circular knitting needle 5mm \ us 8 36 \ 91 cm long * stitch markers * yarn needle gauge 15 sts and 22 row = 4 \ 10 cm square in eyelet stripe stitch check your gauge use any size needles to obtain the gauge shawl measures 72 \ 183 cm at widest point x 24 \ 61 cm at longest point note shawl is worked back and forth in row circular needle is used to accommodate large number of stitches
